thread.title: Note 4 Screen Protector - Protect Your Screen and Enhance the Usability of Your Device (Web Optimizer)
thread.title_full: Note 4 Screen Protector - Protect Your Screen and Enhance the Usability of Your Device (Web Optimizer)

title: Note 4 Screen Protector - Protect Your Screen and Enhance the Usability of Your Device (Web Optimizer)
text: By Web Optimizer Oct 21, 2015 Gone are the days when customers use to treat their mobile devices as utility product and they use to be price-sensitive about it. Now a day, mobile devices are aspirational products and devices for customers, and the users take all possible steps to ensure that the operations and aesthetics of their handset is kept intact and enhanced. Unlike previous times, where in users operated their mobile devices using key pads, now a day most of the mobile phones are screen touch i.e. all the functionalities are triggered using touch or motion sensors which are inbuilt in the screen. Therefore, customers are increasingly sceptic and careful about the health of their screen. The Note 4 glass screen protector precisely serves this purpose. It has been designed and manufactured in such a way that it gets easily installed on the screen, and hence protects the screen from any form of foreign particles such as dust, dirt, sweat and others.The accessory has a screen hardness of 9H which makes sure that it absorbs all the shock and vibrations generated from sudden and unexpected falls, or during any form of rough usage. The screen faces no impression on any turmoil which happens on the screen protectors. In addition to that, the glass cover is made of chemical processed glass which ensures high definition display and improved sensitivity of the device. Customers feel the same sensitivity and smoothness while operating their devices. In addition to the robustness and the enhancement in the display feature, the device is also finger print resistant i.e. the actual screen gets no impression or smudges of any foreign impact which in turn helps in increasing the user life of the device. The Note 4 tempered glass has a glossy finishing which ensures that in addition to the durability of the product, the aesthetics of the same is maintained. It also helps in exposing the settled dirt and dust on the surface so that it could be easily cleaned off. It also has an anti-shattered film which is silicon coated, and makes sure that there are no issues in the adhesion of the glass protector with that of the screen. There are no bubbles and the accessory is firmly fixed to the device.The Note 4 screen protector is available to customers from across the globe in attractive retail packages which are shipped by Amazon. Customers are promised a hassle free shipment within two days from the day of purchase. Based on the order size availed by the customer, they could also get a free shipment offer from Amazon. About the Author The author of this article wrote this article about Note 4 glass screen protector . He wrote many articles about Note 4 tempered glass screen protector. Rating:
